channel.title: HTML Document Structure :: CIS 526 Textbook
channel.description:
When authoring an HTML page, HTML elements should be organized into an HTML Document. This format is defined in the HTML standard. HTML that does not follow this format are technically invalid, and may not be interpreted and rendered correctly by all browsers. Accordingly, it is important to follow the standard. The basic structure of a valid HTML5 document is: Page Title Goes Here

Page body and tags go here.
